note: Gebhard Sengmüller is an artist working in the field of media technology, based in Vienna, Austria. Since 1992, he has developed projects and installations focussing on the deep background of electronic media, retroactively changing the timeline of media history, dissecting and recombining media technologies, and constructing autogenerative systems and networks. His work has been shown extensively in Europe, the Americas and Asia (gebseng.com).
